ygData.subject: Re: Jig vs Selo fatigue
ygData.msgSnippet: The (warrior, I assume) wanted the Jig s  fatigue reduction.  In The Official Player s Guide  the description of Selo s is: Party: Increased movement and
ygData.messageBody:
The (warrior, I assume) wanted the Jig's fatigue reduction. In The Official
Player's Guide the description of Selo's is:

"Party: Increased movement and fatigue".

I am assuming that they mean fatigue reduction by this (the abbreviations are a
little cryptic). I have used the fatigue reduction during solos w/ to work on
peircing/1h blunt skills (I miss a lot, so the fight lasts forever) and see the
stamina bar go back up. Has anyone else tried Selo's for fatigue reduction?

> ? You totally lost me there. So does Selo's what?
>
> Kitasi dazed, confused, and up too early
>
>
> So does Selo's, and I'd lay odds that most of us have that one in our 8
> slots.
>
> > heh heh, yeah I have been spreading the 'bad' word. One guy in a group
> was
> > begging for Jig last week and I started telling him how it didn't really
> > regen mana and so forth when he blurted out. "Who cares about the mana,
> > this frikkin' sword is heavy and I keep gettin' tired!" I laughed myself
> > right onto the floor.
>
>
